title: Ticket #5718: Fix printing ads as xml with whitelist
description:
When using a white-list to print parts of ClassAds in XML format, we can't have the ExprTrees exist in both the original ad and a new temporary ad. It messes with the parentScope pointers and can cause a crash. We need to copy the ExprTrees.

If we're printing the entire ad as XML, then we don't need the temporary ad and no copying is necessary.
remarks:

Code Review
